# Radio Divina FM Alexa Skill
<img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/mobile-apps/dex/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/tutorials/quiz-game/header._TTH_.png" />

### This is an official Skill of Radio Divina Fm.

You can open the skill with this utterance: "open DIVINA FM"
